label: Source
comment: A place from which water originates, such as a hot spring or lake that provides water to public drinking water supplies and private wells.

datatypeProperties.comment: A caution, expressed as text, of a bathing prohibition for this water source.
The code specifying the characteristic of this water source.
A caution, expressed as text, of a drinking prohibition for this water source.
A health benefit, expressed as text, for this water source.
A catch phrase, expressed as text, for marketing of this trade product feature.
